requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125, 2.66 GHz | AMD FX-6100, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | ATI Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: Only x64 bit Windows version
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3300, 3.2 GHz | AMD FX-6300, 3GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI | AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: Only x64 bit Windows version
